mainText.attr1: Ships WILL NOT target enemy ships on their own
Don't forget, you can still issue targets
The goal behind this setting is eliminate ship independence.
Use this setting to keep ships in formations, or stationary.
This is a good defensive setting or a way of preventing ships from being drawn into far away fights.
Because turrets have their own behaviour - turrets will still fire on enemy targets.
Having a line of capital ships - in do not engage - in some situations might be far better - are no ships charging enemy columns in or lagging behind.
If player orders are given - after the destruction of the target, ships will return to formation or previous hold position.
Hop into a ship - and pilot it yourself. Your forces won't engage on their own - so they'll be where you left them.
